Name: Margarita (frozen)
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: BLEND all ingredients with flat 7oz scoop of crushed ice.
Review: Citrus freshness with the subtle agave of tequila served frozen.
Nutrition: One serving of Margarita (frozen) contains 203 calories
